text: Ashish Sharma is an Indian television actor. Known for his role as Lord Ram in Siya Ke Ram (TV series). ==Early life== Ashish Sharma was born on August 30 1984 in Jaipur, Rajasthan.He grew up in the pink city with his elder brother and attended the India International School.He then graduated in Fashion Designing from National Institute of Fashion Technology, New Delhi. == References == == Other website == * Category:Indian movie actors Category:Living people Category:1984 births
title: Ashish Sharma
